p: According to the qRT-PCR results in Figure 7, it showed maximum up-regulated expression level of CL8 gene exhibiting 6.08 fold changes in mRNA in S. oryzae adults treated with 6 mg/cm 2 concentration of L. angustifolia EOs for 2 h, followed by 4.76 fold at 10 ppm malathion after 2 h. The minimum expression level reached 1.73 fold in adult insects treated with (6 mg/cm 2) of N. sativa EOs for 1 h as compared with the reference gene (housekeeping gene, Î²-Actin).
